ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By Heaven with its cyclical systems
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So I call to witness the rain-producing sky,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By the heaven with its recurring cycle of rain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of the sky from which comes down the rain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the sky which gives rain, again and again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the raingiving heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: By heaven of the returning rain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By the heaven which giveth the returning rain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Firmament which returns (in its round),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By the sky (having rain clouds) which gives rain, again and again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By the sky with its returning rain,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:11] By the heaven of returns, [of] the rain that returns time and again,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (By the heaven which giveth the returning rain) Allah swore by the heaven which accumulates clouds after cloud, year after year,
